message: Let's start fair, I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  We can negotiate further if you want to keep playing.
That's heavily skewed in your favor, Alice. I propose a 60/40 split. Take it now, otherwise inflation will hurt us both.
I'm willing to compromise, but 60/40 is still too much in your favor. Let's meet in the middle with 70/30. If we keep going, inflation will hurt us both even more.
Alice, we need to settle this now before inflation eats away at the pot. I'm proposing 45/55 - it's a fair compromise that avoids further losses for both of us.
